mapper.select: SELECT B.MENU_NO AS "menuNo" , B.MENU_ORDR AS "menuOrdr" , B.MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , B.UPPER_MENU_NO AS "upperMenuId" , B.MENU_DC AS "menuDc" , B.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS "relateImagePath" , B.RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS "relateImageNm" , B.PROGRM_FILE_NM AS "progrmFileNm" , (SELECT C.URL FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST C WHERE B.PROGRM_FILE_NM = C.PROGRM_FILE_NM) AS "chkURL" FROM COMTNMENUCREATDTLS A, COMTNMENUINFO B WHERE B.Menu_NO > 0 AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = 0 AND A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT C.AUTHOR_CODE from COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS C WHERE C.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tmpUniqId}) ORDER BY MENU_ORDR

SELECT B.MENU_NO AS "menuNo" , B.MENU_ORDR AS "menuOrdr" , B.MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , B.UPPER_MENU_NO AS "upperMenuId" , B.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS "relateImagePath" , B.RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS "relateImageNm" , (SELECT C.URL FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST C WHERE B.PROGRM_FILE_NM = C.PROGRM_FILE_NM) AS "chkURL" FROM COMTNMENUCREATDTLS A, COMTNMENUINFO B WHERE A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tmpUniqId}) ORDER BY B.MENU_ORDR
SELECT URL FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM = (SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM FROM COMTNMENUINFO WHERE MENU_NO = #{menuNo})

select MIN(MENU_NO) from COMTNMENUINFO where UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo} and MENU_ORDR = (select MIN(MENU_ORDR) from COMTNMENUCREATDTLS A, COMTNMENUINFO B where A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tempValue}) AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo})

select count(MENU_NO) from COMTNMENUINFO where UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo} and MENU_ORDR = (select MIN(MENU_ORDR) from COMTNMENUCREATDTLS A, COMTNMENUINFO B where A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tempValue}) AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo})
